description: Junaid Convenience Store is your one-stop shop for daily essentials, snacks, beverages, and household items. Located conveniently in Kamloops and Vancouver, we pride ourselves on exceptional customer service, competitive pricing, and a wide selection of products to meet your needs. Whether you're picking up a quick snack or shopping for essentials, we've got you covered.

store_policies.returns_exchanges: Items can be returned or exchanged within 30 days of purchase with a valid receipt. Products must be unopened and in their original packaging.
store_policies.refund_policy: Refunds are processed within 7-10 business days upon approval. Refunds will only be issued to the original payment method. For cash transactions, refunds will be provided in cash for amounts under $50; amounts above will be refunded via cheque.
store_policies.privacy_policy: Your personal information is confidential and used only for processing transactions or enhancing your experience with our services.
store_policies.customer_support: Our team is available to assist you during store hours. You can reach us by phone or email.

winter_offers: Buy One Get One Free on Hot Beverages: Warm up this winter with our delicious hot beverages. Buy one and get another free!
10% Off on Winter Snacks: Enjoy cozy winter evenings with our selection of cookies, chips, and seasonal treats.
Free Hot Chocolate with Every $20 Purchase: Spend $20 or more and get a complimentary cup of hot chocolate on us!
Seasonal Gift Hampers (Starting at $19.99): Perfect for gifting! Get exclusive winter-themed gift hampers at discounted prices.
15% Off on Bulk Orders for Holiday Events: Planning a holiday party? Avail of 15% off on bulk orders of snacks, beverages, and more.
Winter Membership Perk: Members get an additional 5% discount on all purchases during the winter season.
Limited Edition Winter Products: Grab our special winter-only products before they sell out!
Spend $50 and Get a Free Winter-Themed Mug: A special thank-you gift for our valued customers. Spend $50 and take home a free winter mug!

additional_information.accessibility: Wheelchair-accessible entrances and parking are available for your convenience.

benefits: Free delivery on phone orders (within city limits)
Early access to seasonal sales and promotions
Free gifts on special occasions (e.g., birthdays, anniversaries)
Dedicated account manager for personalized support

faqs.question: Do you offer home delivery services?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer home delivery for select items. Please check our website for delivery zones and fees.

faqs.question: Can I place an order online?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can place an order through our website or mobile app for in-store pickup or delivery.

faqs.question: Are there any loyalty programs available?
faqs.answer: Yes, we have a loyalty program where you can earn points for every purchase. These points can be redeemed for discounts and exclusive offers.

faqs.question: Do you sell gift cards?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer gift cards that can be purchased in-store or online and used for any of our products.

faqs.question: Are pets allowed in the store?
faqs.answer: Service animals are welcome in our store, but we kindly ask that other pets remain outside for the safety of our customers.
